name: Saber Master: Follow the Light
description:
**** The Number 1 Hit Lightsaber Game! ****

"More than any other game it actually puts you in a mindset of a zen master. To win, you must let go, focus, and be in the flow."

The simple, addictive, hilarious, smash hit parody of space and fantasy films!

HOW TO PLAY: Tap anywhere on the screen when your lightsaber reaches the red dot.

Not long ago, in a galaxy very, very near to you, a new way to battle is here.

Pick a hero... Daenerys Stormtrooper, Princess Cinnamon Bun, Space Ball, Slimer the Hut, Dark Lucas, Jar-3PO, Hans Yolo, Chihuahuabaca or even Darth Makeup.

Choose your weapon ... a Wizard Wand, a Lifesaber, Samurai Sword, or maybe the Swith Army Knife.

And then, use your focus to defeat the evil, very well-merchandised enemies.

May the spin be with you, follow the light, try not to get dizzy, and definitely don’t cross the streams!

Created by Space Inch (spaceinch.com) and Burning Flowers (burningflowe.rs)
